sources.title: My Brother, Khosrow
sources.description: Synopsis Khosrow (Shahab Hosseini) who is a bi-polar man is forced to live in his brother’s house Nasser, as his guardian and sister goes abroad for a while. The brothers soon find themsleves in friction due to the challenging behavior of Khosrow and quesrionable moral decisions by Nasser. Director: Ehsan Biglari Writers: Ehsan Biglari, Parisa Hashem Pour Stars: Bita Farahi, Hengameh Ghaziani, Naser Hashemi | Musik komponeret af: Hamed Sabet Details Official Sites: sourehcinema Country: Iran Language: Persian Release Date: 10 May 2017 (Iran) See more » Also Known As: My Brother Khosrow See more » Filming Locations: Tehran, Iran  Runtime: 90 min Sound Mix: Dolby Digital Color: Color Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1

sources.title: Khashm Va Hayahoo ( 2016)
sources.description: Khosrow is a famous married singer involved with a troublesome affair and consequences of fame.

metadata.Plot: Khosrow (Shahab Hosseini) who is a bi-polar man is forced to live in his brother's house Nasser, as his guardian and sister goes abroad for a while. The brothers soon find themsleves in friction due to the challenging behavior of Khosrow and quesrionable moral decisions by Nasser.
